ThingDef.label: SGC BDU
ThingDef.description: Standard field fatigues for SG teams. Durable, practical, and 100% cotton-blend—perfect for offworld diplomacy or high-stakes firefights with snake-worshiping megalomaniacs.\nBonus: now with just enough pockets to lose things in.

ThingDef.Name: Rimgate_TacticalVestBase
ThingDef.label: Utility tactical vest
ThingDef.description: SGC-issued tactical vest for hauling gear and stopping bullets (well, most of them).\nPairs nicely with a steady hand, quick reflexes, and mild paranoia.

ThingDef.label: Spec ops vest
ThingDef.description: Advanced tactical vest used by Tau'ri special operations forces interlaced with Naquadah fibers. Features modular design for attaching additional gear and enhanced ballistic protection.\nFavored by SG teams for its balance of mobility and defense in high-risk missions.

ThingDef.label: Steel plate insert
ThingDef.description: Steel plate insert for Tau'ri tactical vests. Turns your ribcage into a glorified bunker wall.\nHeavy, loud, but delightfully ricochet-y.

ThingDef.label: Composite plate insert
ThingDef.description: Composite plate insert for Tau'ri tactical vests—because steel's too mainstream. Offers solid protection against heat and blunt trauma.\nApproved by SG-1’s fashion-forward scientists and tactical nerds alike.

ThingDef.label: Naquadah plate insert
ThingDef.description: Advanced naquadah plate insert for the Tau'ri SpecOps tactical vest. Provides exceptional protection against energy weapons and ballistic impacts.\nA favorite among SG teams who prefer their armor to double as a portable bunker.

ThingDef.label: Tactical gloves
ThingDef.description: Durable tactical gloves designed for combat and utility tasks. Provide decent protection while maintaining dexterity for handling weapons and equipment.\nStandard issue for Tau'ri special operations forces.

ThingDef.Name: Rimgate_TauriBallisticHelmetBase
ThingDef.label: Ballistic helmet
ThingDef.description: Tried-and-true combat brain bucket. Offers decent protection from energy blasts and bad decisions. Not great for blunt trauma—so maybe don't headbutt Jaffa.\nWorn in black to blend into... alien deserts?

ThingDef.label: Tactical gunlink
ThingDef.description: Synthesize a ballistic helmet and gunlink into an advanced ballistic helmet with integrated tactical gunlink system. Enhances shooting accuracy while providing solid head protection.\nIdeal for snipers, marksmen, and anyone who enjoys looking cool while taking precise shots.

ThingDef.label: Ballistic gasmask
ThingDef.description: Synthesize a ballistic helmet and gasmask into an advanced ballistic helmet with integrated gasmask system. Provides solid head protection while ensuring safety in toxic environments.\nPerfect for hazardous offworld missions where both ballistic protection and respiratory safety are paramount.

ThingDef.label: Tactical Vacsuit Helm
ThingDef.description: Synthesize a ballistic helmet with vacsuit helm and gunlink into an advanced tactical vacsuit helm with integrated gunlink system. Provides solid head protection, respiratory safety, and enhanced shooting accuracy in vacuum environments.\nIdeal for offworld missions requiring both ballistic protection and precision shooting.

ThingDef.label: SGC baseball cap
ThingDef.description: The iconic Tau'ri baseball cap. Stylishly says, “I’m with the SGC,” while boosting your negotiation skills and forehead airflow.\nAlso known to mysteriously increase sarcasm output by 20%.

ThingDef.label: Boonie hat
ThingDef.description: Essential gear for jungle planets, deserts, and anywhere the Dwarfgate drops you without sunscreen. Keeps the sun out, the sass in.\nWarning: May cause wearer to spontaneously mutter 'Indeed.'

ThingDef.label: Tactical backpack
ThingDef.description: Standard Tau'ri tactical backpack for offworld excursions. Perfect for hauling rations, ammo, and that ancient alien device you definitely shouldn’t touch.\nRequires vest attachment because SGC frowns on space chiropractors.

ThingDef.label: Construction kit
ThingDef.description: Essential construction kit attachment for Tau'ri tactical vests. Equipped with tools and materials for on-the-fly repairs and fortifications.\nPerfect for engineers and builders venturing into hostile environments.

ThingDef.label: Fishing tackle kit
ThingDef.description: Specialized fishing tackle kit attachment for Tau'ri tactical vests. Equipped with fishing gear and bait for offworld angling adventures.\nIdeal for colonists who enjoy fishing during downtime on hostile planets.

ThingDef.label: Electronic kit
ThingDef.description: Advanced electronic kit attachment for Tau'ri tactical vests. Equipped with tools and components for repairing and hacking electronic devices.\nPerfect for tech-savvy colonists venturing into alien worlds filled with mysterious technology.

ThingDef.label: Gardening kit
ThingDef.description: Essential gardening kit attachment for Tau'ri tactical vests. Equipped with tools and supplies for tending to plants and crops in offworld colonies.\nIdeal for colonists with a green thumb looking to cultivate life in hostile environments.

ThingDef.label: Medic bag
ThingDef.description: Standard Tau'ri medic bag attachment for tactical vests. Equipped with essential medical supplies for field treatment of injuries.\nA must-have for any offworld mission where getting shot at is a possibility.

ThingDef.label: Ammo pouch
ThingDef.description: Essential ammo pouch attachment for Tau'ri tactical vests. Designed to hold extra magazines and ammunition for extended firefights.\nA favorite among soldiers and mercenaries operating in hostile offworld environments.

ThingDef.label: Melee pouch
ThingDef.description: Specialized melee pouch attachment for Tau'ri tactical vests. Designed to hold extra melee weapons and tools for close-quarters combat.\nPerfect for colonists who prefer to get up close and personal with their enemies.
